pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shortcodes==========A library for parsing customizable WordPress-style shortcodes. Useful as adrop-in component in text-processing applications.Supports shortcodes with space-separated positional and keyword arguments:: [% tag arg1 "arg 2" key1=arg3 key2="arg 4" %]Shortcodes can be atomic or block-scoped and can be nested to any depth.Innermost shortcodes are processed first:: [% tag %] ... content with [% more %] shortcodes ... [% endtag %]Shortcode syntax is customizable:: <tag arg="foo"> ... </tag>See the project's `Github homepage <https://github.com/dmulholl/shortcodes>`_for further details.Note that this package requires Python 3.
